name: World Energy Condensing Stage
description: The beginning of cultivation. Slowly condensing world energy until you are able to breakthrough.

name: Foundation Establishment Stage
description: You begin to form your foundation by allowing world energy to infuse itself into you.

name: Golden Core Stage
description: The core has become so pure that it shines an internal gleam of gold. It signifies the peak for low-tier cultivatiors.

name: Revolving Core Stage
description: Once the core begins to rotate there are significant benefits and it allows for far stronger abilities. It seems to be slowly accelerating.

name: Absolute Core Stage
description: The core moves so fast it seems to not move at all. It seems to be slowly growing.

name: Embody Core Stage
description: Your core begins to deform and slowly reaches out to each of your limbs. Slowly growing to reach the furthest parts of your body.

name: True Core Stage
description: You have become your core and if it was the past you would be considered one of the strongest cultivators.

name: Worldly Core Stage
description: The pinnacle of cultivation, your core begins to emit world energy you can use freely. Unbeatable to all but the most powerful beings.
